articles.description: OceanGate co-founder Guillermo Söhnlein told Business Insider 'forget Titan,' he wants to put a colony in the atmosphere of Venus.
articles.content:
OceanGate's surviving co-founder said he wants to put humans in a colony on Venus by 2050, according to an interview published last week.
Guillermo Söhnlein told Business Insider that he sees humans… [+2099 chars]

articles.author: Noor Al-Sibai
articles.title: After Seeing This Terrifying Study, We're Never Microwaving Plastic Again - Futurism
articles.description: New research has found that microwaving plastic food containers spews out toxic microplastics — and it's freaked out the guy studying it.
articles.content:
New research has found that microwaving plastic food containers spews out toxic microplastics and it's really freaked out the guy who's studying it.
